name: 秦先玉
objective: 本課程將討論二十世紀後半 (1950-1990) 台灣重要科技產業與經濟發展的關聯性，同時也將從日常生活科技與社會的角度分析科技物設計的緣由，最後再帶入工程文化的認識與反思。This course will discuss the relationship between technology and industrial development in Taiwan during the second half of the 20th century (1950-1990). It will also analyze the reasons behind the design of technological objects from the perspectives of everyday life technology and society. Finally, it will delve into the understanding and reflection of engineering culture.
